code: public void process(Exchange exchange) throws Exception {     Thread.sleep(4000).     Message in = exchange.getIn().     // Get the parameter list     List<?> parameter = in.getBody(List.class).     // Get the operation name     String operation = (String) in.getHeader(CxfConstants.OPERATION_NAME).     Object result = operation + " " + (String) parameter.get(0).     exchange.getOut().setBody(result). }
